1. 当一个svg下载(阿里图标库iconfont)下来的时候path里面有fill这个属性的时候，那么通过css是无法改变图标颜色, chrome解析复制的如下

```
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon">
  <use xlink:href="#iconfriend">
    #shadow-root  (closed)
    <svg id="iconfriend" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024"><path d="M770 961c-17.673 0-32-14.327-32-32 0-112.515-61.681-215.444-160.971-268.62-10.717-5.739-18.146-16.35-19.872-28.384-1.729-12.05 2.427-24.339 11.114-32.875 37.12-36.465 57.562-85.195 57.562-137.216 0-106.053-86.28-192.333-192.333-192.333s-192.333 86.281-192.333 192.333c0 52.021 20.441 100.751 57.56 137.213 8.689 8.538 12.845 20.827 11.116 32.877-1.727 12.033-9.155 22.644-19.873 28.384C190.681 713.556 129 816.485 129 929c0 17.673-14.327 32-32 32s-32-14.327-32-32c0-125.343 63.24-240.846 167.009-308.594-13.872-17.591-25.335-36.882-34.227-57.64-13.68-31.931-20.615-65.865-20.615-100.86 0-68.469 26.663-132.84 75.078-181.255s112.786-75.078 181.255-75.078 132.84 26.663 181.255 75.078 75.078 112.786 75.078 181.255c0 34.994-6.936 68.928-20.615 100.86-8.892 20.758-20.354 40.049-34.227 57.64C738.761 688.154 802 803.657 802 929c0 17.673-14.327 32-32 32z" fill="#1A1A1C"></path><path d="M929.698 842.192c-17.673 0-32-14.327-32-32 0-116.339-63.776-222.766-166.441-277.749-10.773-5.771-18.239-16.436-19.974-28.53-1.736-12.111 2.439-24.463 11.171-33.042 38.453-37.773 59.628-88.252 59.628-142.138 0-109.857-89.376-199.233-199.233-199.233-31.577 0-61.76 7.161-89.711 21.285-15.773 7.971-35.021 1.645-42.992-14.129s-1.646-35.022 14.129-42.993C501.257 74.975 541.151 65.5 582.849 65.5c70.312 0 136.416 27.381 186.134 77.099 49.719 49.718 77.1 115.822 77.1 186.134 0 35.936-7.122 70.784-21.17 103.574-9.273 21.648-21.271 41.744-35.817 60.036C896.308 561.913 961.7 680.97 961.7 810.193c-0.002 17.672-14.329 31.999-32.002 31.999z" fill="#1A1A1C"></path></svg>
  </use>
</svg>
```


2. 但是按照这个demo， svg没有#shadow-root  (closed)的话，可以通过 svg path {fill: red}来设置颜色，[Trying to fill a SVG with CSS, but not working](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/37220968/trying-to-fill-a-svg-with-css-but-not-working)

解析的代码如下

```
<svg class="svg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="512.002" height="512.002" viewBox="0 0 512.002 512.002">
<path d="M512.002 97.21c-18.84 8.355-39.082 14.002-60.33 16.54 21.686-13 38.342-33.584 46.186-58.114-20.3 12.04-42.777 20.78-66.705 25.49-19.16-20.415-46.46-33.17-76.674-33.17-58.012 0-105.043 47.03-105.043 105.04 0 8.232.93 16.25 2.72 23.938-87.3-4.382-164.7-46.2-216.51-109.753-9.04 15.515-14.222 33.56-14.222 52.81 0 36.444 18.544 68.596 46.73 87.433-17.22-.546-33.416-5.27-47.577-13.14-.01.44-.01.88-.01 1.322 0 50.894 36.21 93.348 84.26 103-8.812 2.4-18.093 3.687-27.673 3.687-6.77 0-13.35-.66-19.764-1.888 13.37 41.73 52.16 72.104 98.127 72.95-35.95 28.175-81.243 44.966-130.458 44.966-8.48 0-16.84-.496-25.06-1.47 46.487 29.806 101.702 47.196 161.022 47.196 193.21 0 298.868-160.062 298.868-298.872 0-4.554-.104-9.084-.305-13.59 20.526-14.81 38.335-33.31 52.417-54.373z" fill="#FFF"></path>
</svg>
```

解决1方法：

- 代码暂时无法解决。可以在iconfont中该图标的svg后，把里面的fill去掉，然后在上传替换icon
